item.title: Hello world!
item.description: A small welcome to the blog. Tells a rather brief story of why is this here.
item.dc:creator: Ahmet Novalic
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

This is my first post here. I have blogged before, in Bosnian, and I was considering moving all of those posts here, but its better not to. It would be really painful to translate that, and I want to start a new chapter anyway, so here we are.

Purpose of this blog? Well, it just not just a blog, rather than a collection of things that I would love to share with a world (that might be a blog though). I have a few (hopefully cool) projects that I am working on, and I miss writing, so this place will fill that gap: a place for me to share things with the world.

Thanks for stopping by, if you were expecting something else here, drop me an email, or tweet, and I will get back to you, I promise.

Thanks,
Ahmet
